name: Wave Of Mutilation Poster - 18"x24"
description:
A print is now available of the bleak, surreal meal that is Wave Of Mutilation. 

This print is specially edited with added text and black/white blocks.

Print is 18" x 24" in size and comes hand signed and numbered.

These prints are handled and delivered by myself. 

Original Image: http://doodles4noodles.deviantart.com/gallery/33022844#/d4btx5t


Art Info:

Wave Of Mutilation has been exhibited in various galleries around Akron & Cleveland, OH. It received an honorable mention from a Fresh Art juried show at Summit Art Space and the image has been printed in local papers.

Wave is a political cartoon mustered in evil surreal gloop.

The piece was created a week prior to the Japanease tsunami and revealed to the public, ironically, on the day of the disaster at Summit Art Space.

Think of the wave as a metaphor for all the unnecessary social, political, and technological bullshit in our lives.

It's growing everyday as we constantly pollute our minds, bodies, and Earth.

Look out, it's coming.

name: Gloomy's Cloak of Revelation Poster 18" x 24'
description:
Poster version of an original pencil drawing.

Print is 18" x 24" in size and comes hand signed, numbered, and has a one of a kind doodle on the back and separate.

These prints are handled and delivered by myself.


Piece Info:
Gloomy has been exhibited in various galleries around Akron, Ohio and has been published in the online magazine, The College Journal.

Gloomy was brought to life in hence of a local gallery holding a "miniature works" show. 

The original intention was not to create a wizard. But Gloomy revealed himself most ravishly.

The use of his cloak is a wonderful contradiction. While his body remains hidden behind imagery, the imagery itself is surmised from his emotions and imagination. Hence, Gloomy is hidden behind his own revelations. Something I think many can relate to.
